CustomField.description: Key product / instance info for the CBA
CustomField.formula: Text( Product__r.Qualification__c ) & " - " & TEXT( Product__r.Level_PQ__c ) & " - " & Text( Product__r.Paper__c ) & " - " & Product__r.Course_Type__c & " - " & Instance__r.Study_Location__r.Name & " - " & Text( Instance__r.Start_Date__c ) & " - " & Text( Instance__r.Session_Duration__c )
CustomField.label: CBA Name
